record.title: ORDER TO CONSIDER BUDGET RESOLUTION
record.narrative:
ORDER TO CONSIDER BUDGET RESOLUTION -- (Senate - March 07, 2008)

[Page: S1781]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the concurrent budget resolution on Monday, March 10, at 3 p.m., and that on Monday there be debate only, with no amendments in order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
